vulnerabilities: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (CWE-79)
description: The function does not properly validate or sanitize the input received in the 'decodeKeys' and 'decodeValues' parameters. This can lead to vulnerabilities such as Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) (CWE-79) and Injection (CWE-20) if the input is used in a context where it can be interpreted as code or executed.
